scenarios.name: Library Load completes successfully
scenarios.given: the system is initialized and ready for Library Load operations
scenarios.when: a valid Library Load request is processed
scenarios.then: the operation completes without errors and emits success events

scenarios.name: Library Load handles failures gracefully
scenarios.given: the Library Load operation is in progress
scenarios.when: an unexpected error occurs during execution
scenarios.then: the system logs the error, emits failure events, and maintains consistent state

scenarios.name: Library Load records telemetry metrics
scenarios.given: telemetry collection is enabled for Library Load
scenarios.then: duration, success/failure counts, and relevant metadata are recorded
